title: NEL service delayed due to train fault

updates.text: 14/11, 10.56am: NEL full svc has resumed. Free bus rides & Bridging Buses svc have ceased. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
14/11, 10.36am: NEL full svc has resumed. Free bus rides & Bridging Buses svc are still available at designated bus stops. We are sorry.
14/11, 10.19am: NEL delay: To assist with your journey, free bus rides & bridging buses available btwn HarbourFront NE1 & Dhoby Ghaut NE6.
14/11, 9.33am: NEL svc is delayed due to a train fault at Outram Park NE3. Additional travel time of abt 15 mins may be expected.
